Title: First Place
Description: Presented a live demonstration of a CNN that could break some simple captcha.

Title: Runner Up
Description: Trained an object detection algorithm that could detect a few hand signs.

Title: Runner Up
Description: A 10 day contest involving a highly skewed dataset to detect debit card fraud.

Title: Peoples Choice Award
Description: Presented a simple carry-on device created using a Raspberry Pi and an accelerometer sensor that can detect if a person has been assualted and if so sends SMS alerts.

Title: Winner
Description: Demonstrated a proof of concept of an Android app that could be potentially used to non-intrusively detect potholes using an LSTM that analyzes sensor readings from the mobile phone.
